name: Moisture Surge 72-Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
details: What it is:  A refreshing- oil-free gel cream that provides a moisture boost and locks in hydration for up to 72 skin-quenching hours.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: DrynessFormulation: Light Gel CreamHighlighted Ingredients:- Auto-Replenishing Technology with Caffeine: Helps support skin’s own rehydration system. - Hyaluronic Acid Fragments and Activated Aloe Water: Plump the look of skin with moisture.- Super-Holding Matrix of Humectants and Polymers: Helps reduce water loss and seal in moisture. details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive

Solutions for:
- Dryness
If you want to know more…Clinically formulated cleansing—that's how great skin starts. This dermatologist-developed Facial Soap maintains protective lipids and loosens surface flakes to leave skin clean- comfortable- and refreshed—never taut or dry. It rinses away easily and prepares skin perfectly for the exfoliating action of Clarifying Lotion- while the convenient pump dispenser provides just the right amount of product.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Phthalates
What else you need to know:This product is allergy tested- dermatologist developed- and free of fragrance- oil- silicone- alcohol- and gluten. Mild and Oily Skin versions are oil-free.

name: Beyond Perfecting Foundation + Concealer
details:
What it is: 
A 24-hour wear- oil-free foundation and concealer in one that is lightweight and moisturizing—offering full-coverage without clogging pores.

Coverage: Full 

Finish: Natural  

Formulation: Cream 

Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily 

Highlighted Ingredients: 
- Trehalose- Lechitin- Sodium Hyaluronate

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates.

What Else You Need to Know: Clinique’s Beyond Perfecting Liquid Foundation has a natural matte finish with full coverage. It’s also formulated without oil- and is sweat- and humidity-resistant- dermatologist-tested- non-acnegenic- and appropriate for all skin types. This product is 100 percent fragrance-free.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Due to the rich pigment level that enhances this flawless-coverage makeup- shades may appear deeper when first applied. Once blended completely and allowed to dry- Beyond Perfecting Makeup will melt into your skin for a Beyond Perfected flawless look. -A little goes a long way. Using the large backside of the wand- sweep foundation across your forehead- cheeks- and chin.
-Then use the angled tip of the applicator—it has a slight dip in it to hold more product—to cover down the bridge of the nose and across the jawline. Blend well with fingers.-Finish by using the pointy tip to spot conceal any trouble :  the eyes- around the outside of the nose- on top of blemishes. -Pat and blend well with fingers.
ingredients: unknown

name: Clinique iD™ Custom-Blend Hydrator Collection
details: What it is:  A revolutionary- custom-blend hydrator that gives you the power to hydrate your way.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dullness and Uneven Texture- Fine Lines and Wrinkles- and Dark SpotsFormulation: Lightweight GelIngredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know:  This collection allows for the custom hydration. Begin by picking your hydration base- add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done; there are up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. How do I know if this tint works with my skin tone? Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide to see if BB-gel is a good fit for you. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sunkissed look. Clinique does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones. Apply BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation. A little goes a long way.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.-For best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.

name: Acne Solutions™ Clinical Clearing Gel
details: What it is:  A topical treatment for breakouts with results as good as a leading prescription that starts working instantly. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes- Pores- and OilinessFormulation: Lightweight GelHighlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.  - Lamincaria Sacharina Extract: Minimizes shine and fights the appearance of future breakouts.- Witch Hazel: Helps de-shine skin’s surface and tighten pores.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: This daily treatment gel starts clearing blemishes upon application and helps prevent new ones from making an unwelcome appearance. If you have acne-prone skin with persistent breakouts- you can use it all over the face or as a spot treatment. Regular use helps make visibly clearer skin a way of life.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply a thin layer to entire face twice a day after cleansing. Precautions:-Spot-apply if you are using another leave-on acne treatment.-Using other topical acne drugs at the same time or right after use of this product may increase dryness or irritation of skin. If this occurs- only one medication should be used unless directed by a doctor.-If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs- reduce usage to every other day.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.  -Lamincaria Sacharina Extract: Minimizes shine and fights the appearance of future breakouts.-Witch Hazel: Helps de-shine skin’s surface and tighten pores. Alcohol Denat.- Water - Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer - Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) - Laminaria Saccharina Extract - Sea Whip Extract - Butylene Glycol - Benzalkonium Chloride.

name: Take The Day Off Makeup Remover For Lids, Lashes & Lips
details: What it is: A go-to makeup remover that gently erases long-wearing eye and lip makeup without tugging skin.What it does: This eye and lip makeup remover leaves nothing behind. It effortlessly dissolves long-wearing makeup- even waterproof mascara. This gentle formula is tug-free- non-irritating- and non-stinging.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This eye and lip makeup remover leaves nothing behind. It effortlessly dissolves long-wearing makeup- even waterproof mascara. This gentle formula is tug-free- non-irritating- non-stinging- and oil-free.BeautyTip:After using remover- massage Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm onto dry skin- and then follow with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ for smoother- healthier-looking skin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake well before using.-Saturate cotton ball with remover.-Cleanse one eye area at a time.-Apply to eye area and hold for several seconds- then wipe with downward strokes.-Repeat using fresh cotton ball if necessary.-Use a new saturated cotton ball or tissue for lipstick removal.-Rinse with cool water.

name: Acne Solutions Cleansing Foam
details: What it is:  A mild- medicated cleansing foam that helps clear and prevent acne.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes- Redness- and OilinessFormulation: Lightweight LiquidHighlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.  - Lamincaria Sacharina Extract: Diminishes shine and addresses future breakouts.- Caffeine- Sucrose- Sea Whip Extract- and Kola Nut Extract: Help soothe and calm redness associated with breakouts.Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: This medicated cleansing foam removes dirt and excess oil. It soothes and calms redness associated with breakouts and helps keep pores clear. This mild cleanser is Step 1 in CLINIQUE’s Acne Solutions Clear Skin System.The best way to get breakouts under control is a consistent- non-irritating routine. Each step of CLINIQUE’s Acne Solutions Clear Skin System has a purpose—cleanse- exfoliate- treat. Use all three steps together to see a 37 percent reduction in active blemishes in three days. With consistent twice-a-day use- the results just keep getting better.Clinical Results: When used as part of the full Clinique Acne Solutions Clear Skin System:- Active blemishes are reduced by 48% after 1 week- Active blemishes are reduced by 55% after 4 weeks- Active blemishes are reduced by 73% after 6 weeks - Active blemishes are reduced by 81% after 12 weeks

details:

An eyeliner pencil that offers a richly pigmented shade for instant intensity. 
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- mineral oil- and fragrances. What Else You Need to Know:Twist up and glide on vivid- transfer-resistant color. details:
What it is:A dermatologist-developed three-step skin care regimen for dry combination skin types.

The calming exfoliating lotion whisks away pore-clogging oil and flakes to reveal clearer skin. details:

A 24-hour wear- eyeliner pen that delivers a precise- dramatic line.
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and synthetic fragrances. What Else You Need to Know:Clinique’s mistake-proof pen creates a clean line in one steady sweep. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-To create a thin line- use the pointed tip of the brush. -To create a thick line- use the flat side of the brush. To create a tight line: -While looking into a mirror- tilt head back 10°- making it easier to see the lash line. -Starting at outer corner of eye- draw a line to the middle of the lash line. -Repeat from inner corner of the eye- connecting to the first line. To create a cat eye: -Start with the tight line as directed above. -Create the perfect diagonal line for your eye shape by drawing a short thin line upward towards the outer corner of your eyebrow.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Phthalates

- 92% reduction in the appearance of visible pores in 1 week
- 94% improvement in the appearance of blackheads when used twice daily in 6 weeks

 Precautions:-Avoid eye area.

details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Pores and Uneven Texture that addresses skin concerns.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Pores- Dullness- and Uneven Texture  Formulation: Lightweight LotionHighlighted Ingredients:- Alpha Hydroxy Acids: Cleans away dead skin cells and rough patches to reveal fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know: This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE do not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Cleansed- exfoliated skin accepts moisture better- so for best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or only where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply the BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation—a little goes a long way. Pump just once onto fingertips. -Ensure encapsulated color pigments bloom by rubbing between fingertips.How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.

-Reapply as needed throughout the day.

name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Uneven Skin Tone
details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Pores and Uneven Texture that addresses skin concerns. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns:  Dullness- Uneven Texture- and Dark Spots Formulation: Lightweight LotionHighlighted Ingredients:- Japanese Angelica Root: Helps encourage a more even-looking skin tone.- Ascorbyl Glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.- Salicylic Acid: Helps create fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know: This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Cleansed- exfoliated skin accepts moisture better- so for best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or only where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply the BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation—a little goes a long way. Pump just once onto fingertips. -Ensure encapsulated color pigments bloom by rubbing between fingertips.How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.
ingredients: -Japanese Angelica Root: Helps encourage a more even skin tone.-Ascorbyl Glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.-Salicylic Acid: Helps create fresher-- smoother-- and brighter-looking skin. name: Clinique iD™:  Moisturizer + Concentrate for Irritation
details: What it is:  A first-of-its-kind custom blend of Dramatically Different™ Moisturizing BB-gel with Active Cartridge Concentrate for Irritation that addresses skin concerns your way. Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: RednessFormulation: Lightweight LotionHighlighted Ingredients:- Lactobacillus Probiotic Ferment: Helps to support skin’s natural defenses against external stressors to help keep skin in balance.Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. What Else You Need to Know: This fragrance-free collection allows for customized hydration that’s suitable for a range of skin tones with up to 20 combinations designed for all skin types. Begin by picking your hydration base- then add a cartridge to address your main skin concern- and you’re done. This collection uses Custom-Blend Chemistry Technology™ which isolates the concentrated actives in the cartridge from the base and delivers optimized results with every pump by freshly combining the precise dose of concentrated actives and base for the ultimate customized experience. Please note BB-gel is not a universal tint for all skin tones. Follow these tips to see if the tint will work with your skin tone: Use the camouflage print on the bottle as a guide. The swirls represent the skin tones that are most suitable for this formula. It generally works best on moderately fair to medium deep skin tones- but it depends on the look you want. On some skin tones- you’ll see a hint of tint- on others- a sun-kissed look. CLINIQUE does not recommend this tint for very fair or very deep skin tones.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Cleansed- exfoliated skin accepts moisture better- so for best results- apply after using a cleanser and exfoliator.-Apply to face and neck- all over or only where needed.-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply the BB-gel like a moisturizer—not a foundation—a little goes a long way. Pump just once onto fingertips. -Ensure encapsulated color pigments bloom by rubbing between fingertips.How to assemble:-Unscrew the top on the Hydration Base.-For initial use- remove the plastic before inserting your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Insert your Active Cartridge Concentrate into the Hydration Base.-Pump to prime until it’s dispensing both formulas.-Now the system is freshly combined for optimized performance with every use.

What it is:A creamy- light concealer that brushes on to brighten- perfect- and soften the look of fine lines and wrinkles.What it does:This sheer-coverage concealer softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles and contains light-diffusing optics that brighten shadows. The creamy- oil-free formula flows through the unique brush applicator for a smooth- precise application.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
What else you need to know:Ophthalmologist tested. Non-acnegenic.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply on bare skin or over foundation.-Touch on with brush where skin needs brightening cover: inner and outer corners of eye- sides of nose- etc. Or- finger-blend into skin using a light- patting motion.-Build coverage by adding more when needed.-Avoid rubbing once application is complete.-Note: The first application usually requires several full turns to initially dispense product on the brush applicator. Subsequent applications require only 4 to 5 clicks- not full turns.

details:

What it is formulated to do:This dermatologist-developed cream ups the hydration intensity of Clinique’s cult-classic formula. Formulated to combine all-day moisture with skin-strengthening ingredients for very dry skin- it creates more resilient- nourished- and youthful-looking skin. 
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know:This product is allergy tested- dermatologist developed- non-acnegenic- and free of fragrance- alcohol- SLS- talc- and mineral oil. It is comprised of 100 percent vegan ingredients.

name: Acne Solutions™ Cleansing Gel
details: What it is:  A lightweight- foamy gel cleanser that helps clear blemishes and prevent future breakouts.Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Skincare Concerns: Acne and Blemishes- Redness- and OilinessFormulation: Lightweight LiquidHighlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.   - Lamincaria Sacharina Extract: Minimizes shine and fights future breakouts.- Evening Primrose and Caffeine: Comforts and soothes blemish-prone skin. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates. This product is also gluten-free.What Else You Need to Know: This medicated- oil-free foaming cleansing gel with salicylic acid helps clear breakouts and blackheads. It unclogs pores and helps control oil- leaving skin feeling fresh- soft- calm- and smooth. It also comforts and soothes blemish-prone skin with evening primrose and caffeine.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Use twice a day- morning and night.-Apply to Acne Solutions Deep Cleansing Brush Head or lather between palms with warm water.-Massage over makeup-free face- avoiding eye area.-Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry. -Follow with Acne Solutions Clarifying Lotion and All-Over Clearing Treatment.
ingredients: -Salicylic Acid and Acetyl Glucosamine: Help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.  -Lamincaria Sacharina Extract: Minimizes shine and fights future breakouts.-Evening Primrose and Caffeine: Comforts and soothes blemish-prone skin.  This product is allergy-tested and 100 percent free of fragrance.

name: All About Shadow - Quad
details:
What it is:
 A palette of eyeshadows in four complimentary colors that allows you to create a variety of looks- from natural to dramatic. 

What it does:
 All About Shadow Quads feature four versatile- complimentary shades to wear alone or layer together in different combinations. For dark skintones- lighter shades will impart a more dramatic look and dark shades for a more natural style. Dark shades look more dramatic on fairer skins; light ones look more natural.

- Parabens

 These powder colors are formulated to be crease and fade resistant- and are ophthalmologist tested for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes. This set includes a mirrored compact with illustrated instructions plus two sponge-tip applicators.

-Use sponge-tip applicator to sweep an allover base shade across entire lid- lash line to brow. 
-Create dimension with medium-toned shades. Layer and blend color into the crease and/or along lash lines.
-Deepest shade can be applied as a liner along lash lines using the applicator tip.
-For a more detailed application- choose specialists from Clinique's Makeup Brush Collection.
-Remove with your favorite Clinique makeup remover.

Complexions with very fair to pink undertones- use Shade 01. Very fair- moderately fair- and golden undertones- use Shade 02. Moderately fair to medium complexions with golden undertones- use Shade 03. Golden to deeper skin tones- use Shade 04.

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: High Impact Lash Elevating Mascara
details:
What it is:
An uplifting mascara that gives lashes weightless volume with all-day hold. 

What it does:
 Formulated with lash-conditioning mamey seed oil- this gentle- long-wearing mascara is infused with curling polymer to bring lashes to new heights that lasts all day. This lightweight- mousse-like formula will not clump or flake- and is smudge-resistant. It’s also ophthalmologist tested so even sensitive eyes look bigger- brighter- and boosted.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 This product is ophthalmologist tested- allergy tested- and 100 percent free of fragrance. It’s also free of formaldehyde- formaldehyde resin- toluene- DBP (dibutyl phthalate)- and camphor. It’s safe for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers- and it works on all lash types. Sweat- and humidity-resistant- it’s formulated with lash-conditioning mamey seed oil.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Start at the base of lashes and wiggle brush up to the tip of lashes.-Repeat to build.-To apply to lower lashes- hold wand vertically.-Do not pump brush in container- this adds air that can dry out the mascara.-To prevent clumping- let mascara dry between coats.Long-wearing formulas like this have a lot of staying power. Here are two ways to remove it: Use Take The Day Off™ Cleansing Balm (sold separately):-Scoop out a coin-size amount with dry hands. -Close your eyes and massage balm over lashes and eye area. -Apply warm water and massage for about 10 seconds. This gives the balm time to break down tenacious- long-wearing makeup. -Rinse well with warm water and pat dry. -Follow with a dry cotton pad to remove any residual product.Use Take The Day Off™ Makeup Remover For Lids- Lashes & Lips (sold separately):-Saturate a cotton pad with remover- and gently press it over your eyes for about 10 seconds. This gives the remover time to break down tenacious- long-wearing makeup so you can sweep it away. -Swipe a cotton pad under the eyes to remove any residual product. -Follow with a gentle face cleanser.

name: Fresh Pressed Clinical™ Daily + Overnight Boosters with Pure Vitamin C 10% + A (Retinol)
details:
What it is: A fresh- potent day-and-night de-aging booster system that delivers results equal to a leading prescription for lines and wrinkles.
Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily
Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles- Dullness and Uneven Texture- and Dark Spots
Formulation: Lightweight Serum
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Vitamin C 10%: Works on skin's surface to instantly brighten for even-toned and retexturized skin with continued use. 
- Vitamin A (Retinol): Penetrates skin's surface for visibly improved fine lines and wrinkles and revitalized skin.
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens- phthalates- and fragrance.
What Else You Need to Know:  Breakthrough boosters turn your moisturizer into a de-aging powerhouse. While using Vitamin A (Retinol)- you may see a little dryness- redness- or peeling- all signs it’s working. Use a daily moisturizer- a gentle- sulfate-free cleanser- and wear sunscreen daily (skin may be more photosensitive). Night Boosters with pure Vitamins C 10% and A (Retinol) are freshly activated to deliver prescription-level results against visible wrinkles.* Simply mix a few pumps with your favorite Clinique moisturizer—Vitamin C in the morning- Vitamin A at night. Enjoy a potent de-aging boost without changing the moisturizer you love.
Every day- Vitamin C 10% works on skin's surface to instantly brighten. See remarkably even-toned and retexturized skin with continued use. 
Every night- Vitamin A (Retinol) penetrates deeply into skin's surface. Over time- skin appears revitalized- lines and wrinkles 're-filled-' youthful tone recaptured.
1+1 system contains: 
- 0.28 oz/ 8.5 mL Vitamin C 
- 0.23 oz/ 7 mL Vitamin A 
2+2 system contains: 
- 2 x 0.28 oz/ 8.5 mL Vitamin C 
- 2 x 0.23 oz/ 7 mL Vitamin A
Clinical Results: Based on a 12-week clinical study using Vitamin C 10% in AM and Vitamin A (Retinol) in PM- vs. nighttime use of a leading prescription ingredient:
- Radiance instantly boosted after 1 AM use
- In 1 week- smoothness and texture improved
- In 4 weeks- fine facial wrinkles visibly reduced
- In 12 weeks- skin tone is more even and deep-set wrinkles and forehead lines dramatically reduced
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:To activate:
-Leave cap on. Remove foil. 
-Firmly press inner bulb two times to release Vitamin into the de-aging soothing emulsion.
-Shake 15 seconds. 
To use: 
-Shake before use. Remove cap.
-Press bulb two to three times to dispense into palm of hand.
-Mix in hand with a dollop of your moisturizer. Smooth all over face. Daily sunscreen is imperative.

name: Dior Airflash Spray Foundation
details: What it is: An ultra-fluid- water-resistant foundation that blends full coverage with a lightweight formula- providing airbrushed perfection for up to 12 hours.Coverage: Full  Finish: Radiant  Formulation: Liquid Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily  Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product also comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Enriched with light-diffusing pigments- this foundation smooths the look of skin and gives the complexion a radiant- perfected look that lasts all day. The unique micro-diffusion spray system delivers a fine mist of foundation to provide a soft- velvety complexion. The water-resistant formula ensures up to 12 hours of hold and colors that stay true. The ultra-fluid and ultra-fine texture allows for buildable- custom coverage to suit any skin tone and texture.Clinical Results: In an instrumental test on 20 people:- The water-resistant formula stayed color-true for up to 12 hours
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake the can for five seconds. -Hold your arm at a 90-degree angle- and spray from approximately eight inches directly onto the face in a Z formation. -Alternatively- spray onto the Dior Backstage Buffing Brush (sold separately)- and apply in small- circular motions to the face- gently dabbing onto areas that require more coverage.-Repeat as needed until you achieve your desired coverage.

name: BACKSTAGE Eyeshadow Palette
details:
What it is: 
An all-in-one eyeshadow and primer palette with one primer and eight blendable shades in matte and shimmer finishes.

What Else You Need to Know: These all-in-one eye palettes have everything you need to prime- shade- and highlight for runway-ready eyes. It includes an eye primer that reinforces shadow hold and enhances the look of pigment- and eight shades designed to blend beautifully and be used as either eyeshadow or liner.
 The Dior Backstage Eye Palette is available in four universal shade ranges: rosy hues with cool undertones- brown neutrals with warm undertones- fiery neutrals in amber tones- and luminous neutrals in rosewood tones to create an array of customizable eye makeup looks.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply the primer to the entire lid.-Add color to the lid by applying a lighter shade on the brow arch.-Intensify the eyes by applying a more intense shade along the lash line and to the outer corner of the eye. -Deepen the look of the eyes by applying a darker shade under the eye- then blend.For a natural look: -Apply a neutral shade to the entire eyelid- then add a deeper shade blended around the upper lash line to create soft dimension. -Highlight by applying a lighter shade under the eyebrow arch and to the inner corner to open up the eyes.For a sophisticated look: -Apply a more intense shade to the entire lid.                            -For additional definition- add a darker shade along the upper and lower lash line. Continue by blending a deeper shade onto the outer corners of the eyes. -Highlight by applying a lighter shade under the eyebrow arch and at the inner corner of the eye.

name: Sauvage Eau de Toilette
options: - 2 oz/ 60 mL Eau de Toilette Spray  - 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Eau de Toilette Spray - 6.7 oz/ 200 mL Eau de Toilette Spray
details: Fragrance Family: Earthy & WoodyScent Type: Warm WoodsKey Notes: Bergamot- Pepper- AmberwoodFragrance Description: A radically fresh composition- Sauvage is both raw and noble. Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Calabrian bergamot- while amberwood unleashes a powerfully woody trail. Sauvage is a fragrance inspired by wide-open spaces under a blue sky that dominates a white-hot desert landscape.  About the Bottle: The pure- pared-down bottle features a signature Dior design- each detail carefully studied. It is a luxurious object resulting from years of technical research and development.About the Fragrance: "To create Sauvage- I used man as my starting point. A strong and unmistakable masculinity. Like the image of a man who transcends time and fashion."—François Demachy- Dior Perfumer-Creator
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.
ingredients: unknown

name: BACKSTAGE Face & Body Foundation
details: What it is: A foundation for the face and body in a wide range of shades with a natural finish and medium- buildable coverage that's waterproof and sweat-resistant.Coverage: Medium Finish: Natural  Formulation: Liquid Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- formaldehydes- formaldehyde-releasing agents- phthalates- mineral oil- retinyl palmitate- oxybenzone- coal tar- hydroquinone- triclosan- and triclocarban- and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also vegan- cruelty-free- and gluten-free- and comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Achieve a flawless complexion on both the face and body. The lightweight- waterproof formula resists workout sessions- high temperatures- and humidity- while the pigments create a smooth and natural look. It can also be used to camouflage minor imperfections on the neck- shoulders- legs- or anywhere else.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:To apply for face:-Light coverage: Use your fingers to gently apply one layer of foundation and massage onto face.-Medium coverage: Apply additional foundation with a foundation brush from the center of the face- outwards.-Full coverage: Use a foundation brush and apply up to three layers of foundation- until desired coverage is achieved.To apply for body:-Using a large blending brush- begin with a sheer application on neck- arms- legs- or any other area of concern. -Build up coverage by continuing to add product as needed- balancing out uneven skin tone and concealing imperfections.

name: Dior Forever 24h* Wear High Perfection Skin-Caring Matte Foundation
details:
What it is: A medium-to-full-coverage foundation that remains flawless for up to 24 hours with a velvety-matte finish and SPF 35.Coverage: Medium  Finish: Matte Formulation: Liquid Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily SPF: SPF 35Highlighted Ingredients: - Pansy Extract Hydration Booster: Helps protect the skin from drying- leaving it soothed- and looking smoother and more radiant.- Rose Hip Extract: The star ingredient of Dior Forever- helps protect skin from external aggressors and reduce the appearance of pores.What Else You Need to Know: Dior’s iconic Forever lasts up to 24 hours for skin that appears more even- with tighter-looking pores. This fluid foundation instantly enhances the appearance of the skin and supports its health day after day with a formula enriched in meticulously-selected skincare ingredients. It keeps the complexion comfortable and shields against exterior aggressors- including UVA and UVB rays with SPF 35 broad spectrum sunscreen. Dior Forever creates a flawless- velvety-matte finish on the skin. It is also available in a Glow format for a radiant finish.
This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.

name: Sauvage Eau de Parfum
options: - 2.0 oz/ 60 mL Eau de Parfum Spray  - 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Eau de Parfum Spray - 6.8oz/200mL Eau de Parfum Spray
details: Fragrance Family: Earthy & WoodyScent Type: Citrus & WoodsKey Notes: Bergamot- Amber- VanillaAbout: The powerful freshness of Sauvage exudes new sensual and mysterious facets- amply renewing its signature with an ingenious composition. Calabrian bergamot- as juicy and spirited as ever- invites new spicy notes to add fullness and sensuality- as the woody- ambery trail of Ambroxan® is wrapped in smoky accents of Papua New Guinean vanilla absolute for greater virility. François Demachy- Dior Perfumer-Creator- drew inspiration from the desert in the magical hour of twilight. Mixed with the coolness of the night- the burning desert air exudes profound scents. In the hour when nature awakes and the sky is set ablaze- a new magic unfolds. What else you need to know: "I didn't create Eau de Parfum Sauvage by working on power. Its signature is already very identifiable. It was not a matter of exaggerating or saturating the composition. I was striving more to enrich each of the dominant notes to give it a new color."—François Demachy- Dior Perfumer-Creator

-Apply each day before mascara for immediate results.

name: Dior Forever Skin Correct Concealer
details: What it is: A 24-hour-wear- multi-purpose- full-coverage- creamy concealer that corrects and hides under-eye circles- redness- blemishes- and imperfections.Coverage: Full Finish: Natural  Formulation: Liquid Skin Type: Normal- Dry- Combination- and Oily Highlighted Ingredients: - Wild Pansy: Visibly smooths and moisturizes the complexion. What Else You Need to Know: This concealer—with up to 24-hour wear—hides under-eye circles- redness- and imperfections without settling into facial lines. Enriched with wild pansy extract- this skin-caring formula helps smooth- moisturize- and improve complexion. Available in a wide range of shades and multiple undertones."Forever Skin Correct is applied after blending the Dior Forever fluid foundation- focusing on areas that need additional correction: under-eye circles- localized redness- imperfections. Applied with the applicator- it can be blended with fingers or a brush."—Peter Philips- Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-To correct and conceal imperfections: Select a shade closest to your skin tone- lightly apply concealer directly onto the blemish with the tip of the applicator.-To hide undereye circles: Select a concealer one or two shades lighter than your natural skin tone and apply under the eyes to conceal discoloration.-To brighten complexion: Select a concealer one or two shades lighter than your skin tone- apply on high points of the face such as cheekbones- bow of the lip- and center of the chin.-To contour: Choose a concealer two or three shades deeper than your skin tone and apply beneath cheekbones- along jawline- and hairline to define and contour facial features.

name: Capture Youth Serum Collection
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive

What it is: An age-defying skincare regimen with innovative antioxidant technology capable of delaying visible signs of aging before they appear.

Solutions for:
- Fine lines and wrinkles

- Dullness and uneven texture

- Loss of firmness and elasticity

If you want to know more… Capture Youth offers five targeted serums to meet the specific needs of each skin type. Enriched with antioxidant-rich iris extract- each serum is infused with a naturally-derived active ingredient to target and treat a specific skin concern: dullness- dryness- lack of firmness- oily skin- and redness. These serums are formulated to be used with the universal antioxidant cream for maximum efficacy.

- Glow Booster Serum (to target dullness): vitamin C and AHA combine to brighten and even skin.

- Plump Filler Serum (for dryness/lack of density): hyaluronic acid from fermented wheat hydrates and replenishes the skin to make it appear fuller and more supple.

- Lift Sculptor Serum (for lack of firmness/wrinkles): polyphenols derived from a tea blend boost elastin production to visibly lift and sculpt the skin for firmer- more defined skin contours.

- Matte Maximizer Serum (for oily skin): lactic acid derived from sugar cane regulates excess sebum to help reduce shine and refine pores.

- Redness Soother Serum (for red- irritated skin): natural peptides from cotton reduce redness and irritation for a smoother- more even complexion.
- Intense Rescue Age-Delay Revitalizing Oil-Serum (for dry- dehydrated skin): intensive- lipid-replenishing oil-serum that strengthens the skin's natural barrier to help repair dryness on the skin's surface and maintain hydration.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Apply the serum(s) of your choice daily before your cream for targeted treatment. -If using with the Capture Youth Age-Delay Advanced Crème- add two to three drops directly into the formula and mix in the palm of the hand before applying for faster application.
-Apply the Capture Youth Crème daily- morning and night.
ingredients: Aqua (Water)- Dipropylene Glycol- Glycerin- Glycolic Acid- 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid- Ppg-26-Buteth-26- Tromethamine- Phenoxyethanol- Parfum (Fragrance)- Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil- Sodium Citrate- Tetrasodium Edta- Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract- Xanthan Gum- Adenosine- Sodium Tocopheryl Phosphate- Sodium Metabisulfite- Ci 15985 (Yellow 6)- Iris Florentina Root Extract- Bht- Tocopherol.

options: - 1 oz/ 30 mL Eau de Parfum Spray - 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Eau de Parfum Spray  - 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Eau de Parfum Spray - 5.0 oz/ 148 mL Eau de Parfum Spray - 0.67 oz/ 20 mL Eau de Parfum Rollerball
details: Fragrance Family: FloralScent Type: Fruity FloralsKey Notes: Ylang-Ylang- Damascus Rose- JasmineAbout: The ultimate expression of femininity and luxury. This eau de parfum opens with the exotic- floral-fruity notes of ylang-ylang. Damascus Rose and a duo of jasmines—jasmine grandiflorum and Indian jasmine sambac—exude a seductive warmth. It is sensual without being too heavy- floral yet mysterious. A confident signature to celebrate your feminine allure. "J'adore invents a flower that doesn't exist- an ideal."—François Demachy- Dior Perfumer-Creator.The name means "I love." It is an exalted exclamation that bursts out: "J'adore!"

name: BACKSTAGE Glow Face Palette
details:
What it is: 
A face palette with luminous shades of highlighters for a customizable- BACKSTAGE glow—in two color harmonies which stretch the boundaries of radiance.
What Else You Need to Know: BACKSTAGE is a collection of makeup-artist essentials- designed to suit all skin tones- used at the Dior runway shows- and inspired by the energy backstage. These ultrafine textures are concentrated with shimmery pigments can be worn alone or blended together- for a customizable look—from a natural- healthy glow to intense radiance.This Palette Contains:(Each Sold Separately)001 Universal:- 4 x Highlighters in White- Golden- Bronze- Rosy Blush002 Glitz:- 4 x Highlighters in Gold- Pearly White with Maxi Glitter- Bronze with Holographic Accents- Delicately Shimmering Peach

name: Rouge Dior Lipstick
details: What it is: A collection of high-pigment lipsticks with lasting wear in an array of couture colors and finishes.What Else You Need to Know: Enriched with hydrating mango butter and hyaluronic acid- this long-wear lipstick delivers 16 hours of comfort and color without feathering or drying lips. Rouge Dior comes in a metallic couture case- and the inside of each cap is adorned with Dior’s iconic Rouge 999 shade.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Start by lining the lips with Dior Contour.-For perfectly even results- then apply lipstick with the Backstage Lip Brush working from the center of the lips outwards.-For a bolder finish- apply the lipstick directly on the lips.

details: What it is: A cult-fave- color-awakening lip balm from Dior backstage in a very limited-edition design adorned with Dior's iconic logomania. Highlighted Ingredients: - Wild Mango Butter: Smooths- softens- and hydrates lips. What Else You Need to Know: With its Color Reviver technology- this balm’s formula reacts directly with the moisture level of the lips for custom color to match the skin tone. Enriched with wild mango butter- it also smooths- softens- and hydrates lips for up to 24 hours. Lips look fuller and flushed with natural color.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Wear it alone or below or on top of lipstick.

name: Diorshow Iconic Mascara
details: What it is:A mascara with an innovative oblique brush that curls and defines lashes.What it does:Diorshow Iconic Mascara is the latest in Dior's dazzling range of bestselling mascaras. Created backstage for fashion shows and celebrity red carpet events- the Iconic mascara features an oblique cut brush that gives an extra lash-curling effect.  With its long- skinny teeth- the plastic comb brush allows you to precisely coat each lash one-by-one- creating a long- separated fan of lashes that usually takes the skill of a makeup artist. The extra-hold formula provides a 24 hour-curl with 100% smudge-proof results. What else you need to know:Inspired by the tailoring technique of cutting fabric on the bias to create maximum curve- the Iconic brush features soft silicone bristles that spiral around the stem to lift- curl- and separate every lash.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply Iconic alone for a fabulously eye-opening effect- or apply as a lash-curling base coat underneath classic Diorshow.

name: Diorskin Forever Undercover Foundation
details: What it is: An ultra-fluid long-wear foundation that blends completely full coverage with a weightless texture for a natural finish that lasts.Coverage: Full Finish: Matte Formulation: LiquidSkin Type: Normal- Combination- and Oily Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. This product also comes in recyclable packaging.What Else You Need to Know: Diorskin Forever Undercover offers the most extreme coverage in a Dior foundation yet. This water-based foundation blends full coverage with a lightweight formula to deliver a natural- matte finish that goes from day to night.Clinical Results: In an instrumental test on 20 women:- Finish was shown to last up to 24 hours
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Prime the face with Forever and Ever Wear Makeup Primer (sold separately) for a smooth base that improves the wear and coverage of your foundation.-Apply Undercover Foundation with fingers- or with a foundation brush for full coverage.-Set complexion with Forever & Ever Loose Setting Powder (sold separately) by evenly applying the powder over the entire face with a kabuki brush to perfect and set the foundation.

name: Diorskin Forever Perfect Matte Powder Foundation
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Combination ✔ Oily What it is:
	
A long-wear- pore refining and shine reducing powder compact foundation.


What it does:
This long-wear compact foundation provides medium to full coverage with an extreme matte finish. The formula can be used alone or as a touch-up throughout the day. details:
What it is: A skin-perfecting emulsion to hydrate- blur imperfections- and even out skin tone—with instant and lasting correction on*: uneven complexion- dark spots- pores- redness- dryness- dull complexion- and wrinkles (*Visible results after seven to 28 days).

Bare skin appears more luminous- smoothed- and is more beautiful every day. Beneath foundation- the results are stunning. Instant- lasting results (after seven and 28 days)- visible to the naked eye on bare skin. Capture Dreamskin Care & Perfect emulsion is also available in a refill format. *In vitro test on ingredients.

- 84% more luminous skin instantly
- 78% smoothed wrinkles after 7 days
- 82% blurred dark spots and redness

details: Fragrance Family: Earthy & WoodyScent Type: Citrus & WoodsKey Notes: Bergamot- Amber- VanillaFragrance Description: In this new- highly concentrated interpretation of Sauvage- a sizzle of plump- spicy mandarin brightens the scent's signature freshness. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

details: What it is: A three-in-one setting spray that preps- sets- and refreshes makeup—available in two translucent shades for fair-to-medium and medium-to-deep skin tones.What Else You Need to Know: This long-lasting setting spray is inspired by backstage makeup techniques at Dior’s runway shows. A genuine glow booster and skin perfector- Airflash Radiance Mist gives the complexion a look of radiance and vitality. The formula uses a micro-diffusion technique to set makeup. Light-enhancing pigments help revive the complexion’s natural glow- while hyaluronic acid supports skin’s natural hydration with each use.Clinical Results: In a consumer test of 64 subjects over 1 week- used with their normal foundation:- 100% of testers reported that their makeup was more resistant to melting- cracking- sliding- and fading
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Shake for five seconds before use.-Hold eight inches from the face- close your eyes- and spray over the entire face in a Z pattern.Try these three ways to use Airflash Radiance Mist:-Prep: Dior Backstage Airflash Radiance Mist fuses with the skin- leaving it fresh- soft- and ready for makeup.-Set: The long-wearing formula ensures makeup stays looking beautiful with a weightless effect for a radiant finish that lasts.-Refresh: Light and convenient- the Airflash Radiance Mist can also be used for touch-ups throughout the day to restore a look of radiance to tired- dull complexions.

name: 5 Couleurs Eyeshadow
details:
What it is:
 A five-color eyeshadow palette that adds color from every angle.

What it does:
 An icon of the Dior look- the 5 Couleurs Eyeshadow is now reinvented with more intense pigments and richer effects. A variety of textures come together in a single palette to style the eyes with a layering technique. The Dior laboratories' expertise enables a bold- color-true result. The non-powdery texture blends into an incredibly fine film with spectacular hold- delivering a highly pigmented formula and a second-skin finish. From totally matte palettes to multi-effect harmonies- each combination of 5 Couleurs includes two double-ended foam applicators to easily blend the colors to create endless eye looks. These highly pigmented shades impart a second-skin effect with ultimate staying power. 

This palette contains:
- 5 x 0.24 oz/ 7 mL
- 2 x Double-ended applicators
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
For a natural look:
-Open up the eyes by applying a medium shade on the entire eyelid with the enclosed round foam tip applicator- then add definition by using the liner tip applicator to apply a darker shade along the lash line. 
-Use the brush-end of one of the applicators and the lighter shade to highlight along the brow bone and at the inner corner of the eye for wider-looking eyes.

For a sophisticated look:
-Open the eyes by applying a medium to dark shade on the entire eyelid with the round foam tip applicator. 
-Add definition by applying a darker shade to the outer corner and crease of the eyelid and blend. 
-Using the liner tip- apply the darkest shade along the lash line. 
-Use the brush to blend over the entire eyelid and outward. 
-With the round foam tip and the lightest shade- highlight beneath the arch of the brow and at the inner corner of the eye to create even greater contrast and structure.

name: Capture Youth Glow Booster Age-Delay Illuminating Serum
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Combination
What it is: An anti-fatigue weapon against dull complexions.
Solutions for:
- Dullness and uneven texture
- Uneven skin tone
If you want to know more… This illuminating serum is a glow booster to help restore radiance. Murunga plum- known to be 100 times more concentrated in vitamin C than oranges- combined with alpha hydroxy acid helps to brighten the complexion and smooth skin texture. Enriched with antioxidant-boosting iris extract- this serum has a lightweight texture that offers a natural glow and energizes skin- helping it resist aggressions (stress- fatigue- and jet lag).
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
Research results: In vivo clinical test- 10 women after 6 hours:
- Skin exfoliation +40%In a use test on 60 women:
- 100% of women saw more luminous and even complexions after 4 weeks
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply the Glow Booster Serum daily before your cream for targeted treatment.-For faster application- add two to three drops of the Glow Booster Serum to the Capture Youth Crème and mix in the palm of your hand before applying.

details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Dry
What it is:A high-performance serum that targets lack of skin tone and elasticity to visibly lift- firm- and sculpt the skin.
Solutions for:- Loss of firmness and elasticity- Fine lines and wrinkles
If you want to know more… Rich in naturally-derived polyphenols from a blend of green- white- and rooibos teas- this serum combats a lack of tone and elasticity. It contains antioxidant iris extract to offer an instant tightening effect. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesResearch results: In a self-assessment on 33 women after 4 weeks:- 25% visibly reduced wrinkles In a self-assessment by questionnaires on 33 women:- 100% of women saw skin that appeared more lifted upon application- 91% of women felt their skin contours appeared sculpted after 4 weeks
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:-Apply the Lift Sculptor Serum daily before your cream for targeted treatment.
-For faster application- add two to three drops of the Lift Sculptor Serum to the Capture Youth Crème and mix in the palm of your hand before applying.

name: Hydra Life Hydration Rescue Intense Sorbet Creme
details: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Dry✔ SensitiveWhat it is:An "emergency" balm that nourishes and soothes the skin.Solutions for:- Dryness- Redness- Fine lines and wrinklesIf you want to know more… This luscious balm thoroughly nourishes the skin- reinforces its balance- and lastingly soothes feelings of discomfort. Its incredibly lightweight butter texture delivers ideal nourishment with a non-greasy finish. The skin is left feeling firm- smooth- and soft. Day after day- the skin looks stronger- more luminous- and naturally beautiful.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: With its eco-responsible approach- the House of Dior develops products that are gentle on the skin and eco-friendly. The products are dermatologically tested- while the cartons are printed with predominantly natural inks and produced using sustainable forest management methods.Research results:In a blind use test of 60 women:Immediately after use:- 97% said the skin is supple - 98% said the skin is soothedAfter 4 weeks:- 100% said redness is reduced- 98% said skin quality is improvedTests on 32 women after twice-daily application on the face- eye contour and neck- evaluation via questionnaire:- Immediately after use- 97% said skin felt nourished
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply daily morning and night to the face.-When needed- apply to dehydrated areas of the body (hands- elbows- knees- etc.).-Apply up to once a week as an overnight mask.
ingredients: -Mallow Butter: Nourishes and reinforces the skin barrier- supports skin’s water retention and barrier function.-Chamomile Extract: Calms irritation.-Haberlea: Supports the skin's natural defenses.-Mallow: Supports natural circulation of water in the skin for improved hydration.

name: One Essential Skin Boosting Super Serum
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Combination✔ Dry
What it is:A powerful serum that detoxifies- regenerates- and boosts skin for a revitalized complexion.
Solutions for:- Dullness and uneven texture
If you want to know more… Daily- skin faces an onslaught of aggressors including UV rays- stress- and pollution. The solution: the new One Essential- with a more powerful formula that targets 100 percent of both outdoor (microparticles- heavy metals) and—for the first time—indoor toxins (per an in vitro test on ingredients) such as carpet- glue- varnishes- and electronic devices. This Super Serum is the fundamental first step- before any other skincare product- for a revitalizing effect. When applied twice per day- One Essential purifies and strengthens the skin- and the effectiveness of your usual skincare routine is boosted and prolonged by up to four times.
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know: The source of the Red Hibiscus is the Dior Garden located in the heart of the Koro Ecological and Cultural Site. In this garden- covering 20 hectares- nearly 190 plant species flourish- representing an astonishing 18 percent of all species found in Burkina Faso. This remarkable site was selected due to its distinctive geology and the richness of its soil. More than a hectare is entirely devoted to cultivating the hibiscus sabdariffa- or red hibiscus.
The Dior Research Center studied the red hibiscus flower and discovered extraordinary detoxifying power. Red hibiscus extract has been shown to stimulate the recycling process of toxins that have penetrated the cell's lung. 
 One Essential quadruples the effects of active ingredients in the skincare products that follow (in vitro test on different major anti-aging ingredients) like retinol- vitamin C- longoza- hyaluronic acid- and bifidus for lasting radiance.

Research results:In a consumer test on 60 women- after 7 days:
- 98% more beautiful skin
- 98% plumped skin
- 95% fresher skin 
- 95% smoothed skin texture
After 1 month:
- 100% more beautiful skin
- 100% plumped skin
- 98% fresher skin 
- 95% smoothed skin texture
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply on cleansed skin- morning and night- before your usual skincare routine.

name: Diorshow On Stage Liquid Eyeliner
details: What it is:A waterproof liquid eyeliner with up to 24 hours of wear- available in a range of intense colors and effects.What it does:Inspired by backstage- Dior presents its first liner with a hybrid tip that combines the ease of a felt-tip pen with the suppleness of a brush. The fine tip allows for freer application- guiding the line to flawlessly recreate Dior runway looks in a single stroke.The ultra-pigmented- waterproof formula is available in three intense effects—vinyl- matte- and pearl—to line the eyes with extreme wear that lasts for up to 24 hours*. Designed to give all women total freedom of expression- Diorshow On Stage Liner comes in an ultra-shiny Vinyl Black shade- as well as many more shades of intense- pure- saturated matte or pearl color.*Clinical testing- 20 subjects.What else you need to know: “I have a weakness for white- a color that is both pure and very intense. I like using it to enhance another color. First I apply the white and then yellow- for example- just above it to make the color appear even more vibrant. In contact with white- black becomes more intense.”—Peter Philips- Creative and Image Director for Dior MakeupThis product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Start the line moving from the outer corner to the inner corner of the eye.-Then- with your eye open- extend the line outward to open up the look of the eyes.

name: Dior Addict Lacquer Stick
details: What it is: A full-coverage lacquer lipstick that delivers high shine and intense color with just one swipe.What it does: Dior introduces the next generation of lipstick with an addictive hybrid that's half high-shine lacquer and half lip-loving lipstick—for an effortlessly chic look. The high-pigment pop shades glide on easily with one-coat coverage for weightless- comfortable wear that lasts for hours. Paris meets California in Dior Addict Lacquer Stick’s surprisingly intense- vibrant shades that are inspired by L.A. hot spots. Keep it timeless and elegant- or dare to wear the more audacious- experimental tones.What else you need to know: Dior leverages a slower- gentler process for casting the Addict Lacquer Stick. This gives every shade a "fondant" or "melting" core that creates a deliciously sensorial effect as you glide it over your lips. "For this new generation of lacquers- I wanted the comfort of a hydrating balm without compromising on color intensity and shine. All this beauty can be found in one stick: our Dior Addict Lacquer Stick."—Peter Philips- Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup

name: Dior Addict Lip Tattoo
details:
What it is:
 A no-transfer lip tint that stains lips with 10-hour- natural-looking color and a weightless- bare-lip sensation.

What it does:
 Tints lips with bare-lip sensation- 10-hour kiss-proof color. The tinted ink fuses with the lips transparently and lightly- boosting their natural color weightlessly with a healthy wash of color- and with incredible comfort. Wear alone for perfectly natural subtle color- or use as a primer to boost the color and wear of any lipstick or lip gloss. The water-balanced emulsion includes the perfect balance of stains- pigments- and emollients. Kiss-proof and non-transferring- it feels weightless and comfortable- as if lips are bare.

What else you need to know:

"I'm delighted that we succeeded in creating a lip stain that 'tattoos' the mouth with a luminous finish and the feeling of nude lips. Impeccable long wear in a beautiful range of tints."—Peter Philips- Creative and Image Director for Dior Makeup
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-To apply- just place the applicator in the center of the mouth- under the Cupid's bow- and sweep left and right.
-A few seconds after application- the color fuses with the skin like an ephemeral tattoo for the lips.
-Use Lip Tattoo alone for natural-looking color and a bare-lip sensation- or use it as a primer with any Dior lipstick or lip gloss to boost both color and wear.

name: Miss Dior Eau de Toilette Rollerpearl
options: - 0.7 oz/20 mL Eau de Toilette Rollerball
details: Fragrance Family: FloralScent Type: Warm FloralsKey Notes: Mandarin- Roses- Lily of the ValleyFragrance Description: Miss Dior Eau de Toilette is housed in a precious new travel bottle: the Roller-Pearl. The glass bottle is topped with a delicate pearl for free and easy fragrance application. For fragrance touch-ups- to complement your perfume or for perfuming on the go- Miss Dior Eau de Toilette Roller-Pearl is as beautiful as a gem. The sparkling zests of Blood Orange and Mandarin illuminate the top notes. At the heart- Lily of the valley brings freshness and lightness to the spicy burst of Grasse Rose. A base of clear Patchouli brings these happy notes together in an endless round.The glass bead tip delivers just the right amount of fragrance right where you want it- with no waste."At the heart of Miss Dior Eau de Toilette- the light and brilliant Centifolia Rose unfurls its full- luminous beauty. I wanted to give it a unique refreshing quality with a Lily of the valley accord."—François Demachy- Dior Perfumer-Creator
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

- 100% of women reported that the quality of their skin was improved after 4 weeks

-If using with one of the Capture Youth targeted serums- apply the serum daily before your cream- or for faster application- add two to three drops of the serum to the cream and mix in the palm of the hand before applying.

name: Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Crème
details:
What it is:A face cream that works to combat signs of aging and revitalize the look of skin. 

What it is formulated to do:NEW Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Crème revitalizes the look of skin during the night by recharging surface skin cells. The longoza-cellular complex of age-defying ingredients addresses visible signs of aging- while oenothera helps support natural collagen production and diminish the appearance of dark spots to brighten and even out the complexion. Skin will look younger and re-plumped—more beautiful than the day before.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens

Research results:In studies of 32 women aged 50-60 years old who applied Capture Totale Intensive Night Restorative Crème to the face every evening for 28 consecutive days:
- 17% saw firmness of the skin
- 26% saw a more radiant complexion
- 24% saw the appearance of dark spots reduced by 34%
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply daily in the evening following One Essential and/or Capture Totale Multi-Perfection Serum for maximum results.

details:
What it is: A nourishing oil-serum that protects and strengthens the skin's natural barrier.   
Skin Type: Normal and Dry
Skincare Concerns: Dryness
Formulation: Oil
Highlighted Ingredients:
- Argan Oil: Restores lipid content and nourishes the skin- offering an instant feeling of comfort.   
- Fatty Acids from Tamanu (Oilseed from Asia): Help strengthen the skin's natural barrier and soften the skin.   
- Iris Florentina: An antioxidant that boosts the skin's antioxidant power to delay visible signs of aging.* *In vitro test on ingredients.  
 Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES- parabens- and phthalates.
What Else You Need to Know: Capture Youth Intense Rescue is an intensive- lipid-replenishing oil-serum that strengthens the skin's natural barrier to help repair dryness on the skin's surface and maintain hydration. With Intense Rescue- Dior targets dry skin- which is deficient in lipids. It helps repair dryness for skin that feels instantly nourished- supple- and comfortable. With its breakthrough transformative texture- this formula combines the revitalizing power of a serum with the nourishment of an oil.  
Clinical Results: In a blind self-assessment on 60 women- assessment after initial application and after 1 month; immediately after use:
- 93% saw nourished skin/lipids restored
- 88% saw protected skin
- 88% saw areas of dryness disappear
After 4 weeks:
- 93% revitalized skin
- 97% smoother skin

name: Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet Set
details: Fragrance Family: FloralsScent Type: Fruity Florals Key Notes: Grapefruit- MuskFragrance Description: Experience the caress of a fresh rose dressed in peony flowers. This vivacious eau de toilette unfurls with radiant Calabrian bergamot- revealing a tender heart of peony and Damascus rose. Its lingering finish is edged with white musk.This set contains:- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Eau de Toilette- 1.7 oz/ 50 mL Moisturizing Body Milk - 0.68 oz/ 20 mL Nourishing Rose Hand Cream About the Fragrance: 1947: Miss Dior- the couture fragrance- was born in a burst of life—an incarnate of the revolutionary silhouette Dior’s The New Look- evoking the sensuality of its inspiring curves in scent. Since then- the house of Dior has known many a revolution and Miss Dior has accompanied them all.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting- stronger scent. -After applying- avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance- causing it to wear off more quickly. -If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists- be sure to reapply after frequent hand-washing- as this tends to rinse off the scent. -Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent. Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent- EDP contains more- usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs- therefore- last longer and smell more intense.

name: Rouge Dior Ultra Rouge Lipstick
details:
What it is: An ultra-pigmented lipstick with up to 12-hour* wear- a luminous- semi-matte finish- and a hydrating- comfortable formula with intense- saturated color.What it does: Rouge Dior Ultra Rouge is the first incredibly long-wearing lipstick with the comfort of a Dior lip ink. Ultra Rouge offers a lightweight- ultra-comfortable formula and all the color of a high-pigment lipstick. With up to 12-hour wear*- the colors seem more saturated- with a luminous- semi-matte finish- incredible sensoriality- and hydration.Always at the cutting edge- Dior challenged its research department to combine the desire for dazzling color with the need for long-lasting comfort. The result of much research and in-depth scientific studies- Rouge Dior Ultra Rouge is Dior’s first lipstick to combine a polymer with a plant-based oil to deliver absolute hydration- comfort- and up to 12 hours of wear* with no tight or dry sensation. *Instrumental test on 20 subjects. Does not apply to shade 000.What else you need to know: Rouge Dior Ultra Rouge is available in 26 ultra-saturated- couture shades with a luminous- semi-matte finish. Four it-shades of Ultra Rouge make especially strong statements: 999 Ultra Dior: “You can never be too much of a woman- so enjoy it.” Red par excellence- iconic yet different.770 Ultra Love: “Believe in yourself. If you don’t- who will?” This loved-up raspberry is easy to wear- yet has a strong temperament- setting the tone for rosewoods and beiges that border on coral.851 Ultra Shock: “It’s better to be shocking than boring.” A high-impact- heady burgundy that carries intense shades in its wake- from wines and deep browns to greyish taupes and deep purples.777 Ultra Star: “All of us are stars- aren't we?” Poppy stars in a palette of bright hues fed on pop culture.Alongside these potent reds- two collectible shades stand out. These two extreme shades can either be worn alone- making a powerful statement- or as a base or finishing touch- modifying shades to play with colors and intensities:111 Ultra Night 47: A black that enables you to intensify each shade or practice your lip artistry.000 Ultra Light 47: A pure white to neutralize your natural lip color or soften another shade. 
This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Start by lining the lips with Dior Rouge Ink Lip Liner. -For perfectly-even results- apply Rouge Dior Ultra Rouge with the Backstage Lip Brush (sold separately)- working from the center of the lips outwards. -For a bolder color finish- apply the lipstick directly on the lips. -For optimal application- extend the tip only a little- about 1/16 inch or 2 millimeters.

details: What it is:A waterproof version of the bestselling Iconic mascara.What it does:Diorshow Iconic Waterproof Mascara adds to the bestselling Iconic mascara formula by making it waterproof and extending its wear—so lash length and volume lasts all day. Created backstage for fashion shows and celebrity red carpet events- the Iconic mascara features an oblique cut brush that gives an extra lash-curling effect. With its long- skinny teeth- the plastic comb brush allows you to precisely coat each lash one-by-one- creating a long- separated fan of lashes that usually takes the skill of a makeup artist. The extra-hold formula provides a 24 hour-curl with 100% smudge-proof results. Feel free to plunge in and play all day.What else you need to know:Inspired by the tailoring technique of cutting fabric on the bias to create maximum curve- the Iconic brush features soft silicone bristles that spiral around the stem to lift- curl- and separate every lash.

name: Flash Luminizer Radiance Booster Pen
details:
What it is:
An illuminating pen inspired by the lighting techniques of makeup artists to highlight- brighten- and soften the complexion. 

What it does:
The weightless- white-light pigments in the FLash Luminizer Radiance Booster Pen fuse with the skin to capture light around the eyes and across the face for a dewy glow. Formulated with Dior's beautyfier complex™- the blend is enriched with hyaluronic acid microspheres to combat fine lines and wrinkles for petal-soft- youthful-looking skin. The pen's automatic click system delivers the right amount of pigment with a thick- precise- and professional-grade brush for hands-free blending. Signs of fatigue are concealed- the eyes are visibly revived- and facial shadows are illuminated for a contoured and radiant complexion.
how_to_use:
Suggested Usage:
-For a wide-eyed look- dust the brush above and below the brow bone and around the outer corners of the eyes.
-To sculpt the face- evenly distribute the pigment across the forehead- over the bridge of the nose and chin- under eyes- and just above cheekbones where light hits the face.
-To brighten the complexion- fill in darker parts of the face such as the undereye area- around the nose and lips- and the hollow of the chin for a lit-from-within glow.

name: One Essential Eye Serum
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Combination

What it is:A detoxifying serum to boost the eyes’ youthful-looking radiance.

Solutions for:- Dullness/uneven texture- Fine lines/wrinklesIf you want to know more…Enriched with red hibiscus from the Dior Gardens- it eliminates toxins identified at the heart of the skin and intensely revitalizes it. Applied as the first step in your beauty ritual- it multiplies the effectiveness of the ingredients in subsequently applied eye care. The eye contour is revitalized- smoothed- and re-energized. Day after day- it is strengthened and able to lastingly fight against aggressions—leaving eyes sparkling with youthful-looking beauty. 

What else you need to know: The Dior Garden's hibiscus from Burkina Faso. 
Dior Research carried out studies on this hibiscus flower- revealing that its delicate chalice hides under its gown of petals an extraordinary power of detoxification. Hibiscus extract has been shown to stimulate the recycling process of toxins from the cells.The Koro Garden- Burkina Faso. The Dior Garden- dedicated to the red hibiscus- is located in the heart of the Koro Ecological and Cultural Site- an area covering 20 hectares where 18 percent of Burkina Faso’s flora flourishes- representing nearly 190 plant species. This remarkable site was selected due to its distinctive geology and the richness of its soil. More than a hectare is entirely devoted to cultivating the “hibiscus sabdariffa”- or red hibiscus.                         

Research results:In a self-evaluation on 66 women:At application:- 84% saw reduced signs of fatigue- 84% saw a luminous eye contour- 82% saw a more uniform eye contour- 80% saw more vibrance- 79% saw fresher-looking eyes- 69% saw a clarified eye contourAfter 1 month:- 95% saw a more uniform eye contour- 89% saw more vibrance- 89% saw a clarified eye contour- 88% saw fresher-looking eyes- 87% saw reduced signs of fatigue- 87% saw a luminous eye contour

name: Diorsnow Brightening Refining Moist Cloud Crème
details:
Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal ✔ Combination✔ Dry
What it is:A hydrating- refining- and brightening cream that visibly corrects pores and dark spots. 
Solutions for:- Dryness- Uneven skin tone- Dullness and uneven texture
If you want to know more…Thanks to the microencapsulated mattifying Smart Pore Control™—microcapsules of zinc gluconate that visibly reducing the production of sebum and targets the oilier areas of the skin—skin is instantly softer and more even. Day after day- it improves the appearance of pores and spots- revealing perfectly refined- even skin.   
What else you need to know:The exceptional brightening power of the Edelweiss from Dior Gardens. Skin evenness and color are determined by a pigment known as melanin. With aging and repeated sunlight exposure- the undesirable sallow color of melanin spreads all over the skin- altering its evenness. Over time- melanin also becomes darker- damaging the natural skin color. Dior researchers have discovered that Edelweiss extract from the Dior Gardens in Switzerland interferes in this process and can diminish- correct- and prevent the creation of dark spots. Preventive action against spots is one of the most effective ways to achieve lasting efficacy on skin evenness and color correction.Edelweiss is cultivated at the heart of the Valais Garden in Switzerland at an altitude of 1-100 m. In this beautiful but hostile environment- temperatures can drop until -10°C while UV intensity is extreme- heavily reflected by the eternal snows. All the conditions are gathered for Edelweiss to develop the finest flowers- naturally and in the greatest respect of the environment

Research results:In a self-assessment on 60 women after 1 month of use:- 100% said the skin is more luminous - 98% said the skin is more radiant- 95% said the skin is hydrated- 98% said the skin is suppler
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:-Apply to the face in the morning and at night.
